title: Forget Me
description: How would you feel if you lost every memory of the best night of your life? Find out now and one-click to dive into this DJ Rockstar Romance novel.I've waited years to see him perform live. Aaron Callaghan-notorious womanizer, sensational superstar, glamorous heartbreaker.He's not just a DJ. He's a legend. A god behind the turntables and a devil on stage, drumming with people's emotions as if they were nothing more than the strings on his beloved guitar.Finally, my dream comes true. I get the chance to see him live.He's on stage. I'm in the crowd. One of hundreds roaring, one of thousands crying. I'm a nobody to him.Until luck decides to push me into his arms.It was supposed to be the best night of my life, but the next thing I know, I wake up in the hospital.My memories? Gone. My dreams? Evaporated. My life? Not mine anymore.Tough shit, but I'll get through this. I won't throw in the towel just because my brain decided to draw a blank.And my savior? He bolted as soon as the doctors confirmed that I was stable. And he left nothing. No name. No note. No trace.Will I ever get the chance to thank him?I hope so. Because I've got the feeling that he is the last piece I need to solve my memory puzzle.Get ready for FORGET ME, Book2 of the FLORIDA FLOWERS series, and find out how Kendra Farris will unravel the darkest secret of bad boy Aaron Callaghan that will ultimately break her heart. A DJ Rockstar Romance jam-packed with twisted turns, fiery passion, and a love that is strong enough to overpower an unforgiveable mistake. Fans of Tijan, Charleigh Rose, and LJ Shen are going to devour this slow burn romance novel!
author: Elodie Colt
